thread.title: Canadiens beat Sabres 7-2 to improve to 8-0
thread.title_full: Canadiens beat Sabres 7-2 to improve to 8-0

title: Canadiens beat Sabres 7-2 to improve to 8-0
text: Add a message (optional) Success - Article sent! close Buffalo Sabres' Marcus Foligno, right, dives for the puck as Montreal Canadiens goaltender Mike Condon (39) reacts during the first period of an NHL hockey game, Friday Oct. 23, 2015 in Buffalo, N.Y. Associated Press Montreal Canadiens right winger Brendan Gallagher (11) celebrates a goal by Andrei Markov, as Buffalo Sabres defenseman Josh Gorges (4) and goaltender Chad Johnson (31) react during the second period of an NHL hockey game, Friday Oct. 23, 2015 in Buffalo, N.Y. Associated Press Buffalo Sabres right winger (12) and Montreal Canadiens defenseman Tom Gilbert (77) tangle alongside the net as Canadiens goaltender Mike Condon (39) makes a save during the first period of an NHL hockey game, Friday Oct. 23, 2015 in Buffalo, N.Y. Associated Press Montreal Canadiens' Torrey Mitchell (17), Brian Flynn (32) and Devante Smith-Pelly (21) celebrate a goal by Mitchell during the second period of an NHL hockey game against the Buffalo Sabres, Friday Oct. 23, 2015 in Buffalo, N.Y. Associated Press
